truthDare.entry: Pick someone to tell the\nTRUTH!! (or Drink x2)
Pick someone to tell suffer the\nCONSEQUENCES!!\n(or Drink x2)
The person who give you the device:\n DRINKS!
You dodge this one.\n Handle the device to someone else!!
The person to your LEFT:\n DRINKS
The person to your RIGHT:\n DRINKS
The person to your LEFT:\n Tells the TRUTH (or Drink x2)
The person to your RIGHT:\n Tells the TRUTH (or Drink x2)

The person to your LEFT:
 suffer the
CONSEQUENCES!!
(or Drink x2)

The person to your RIGHT:
 suffer the
CONSEQUENCES!!
(or Drink x2)
